Key Match Events: David Brooks scored the first goal for Wales in the 3rd minute.
Neco Williams scored the second goal for Wales in the 38th minute.
Teemu Pukki scored for Finland in the 45th minute.
Brennan Johnson scored the third goal for Wales in the 47th minute.
Dan James scored the fourth goal for Wales in the 87th minute.
Ben Davies had a goal ruled out by VAR in the 79th minute.
Post-Match Reflections: Neco Williams commented on the performance, stating it was a great performance and they have one huge game to go against Poland.
Wales will face Poland in the play-off final for a place at Euro 2024.
